opennlp.ccg.lexicon
Class FactorChainWord

java.lang.Object
  opennlp.ccg.lexicon.Word
      opennlp.ccg.lexicon.FactorChainWord
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<Word>
public class FactorChainWord
extends Word

A FactorChainWord represents a word via a chain of references to factor keys, or just to a string in the case of the word form. Canonical instances are created by a factory method, and stored in a trie map. The factor chain representation should be more space efficient when dealing with large numbers of words.

Version:
$Revision: 1.3 $, $Date: 2009/07/17 04:23:30 $
Author:
Michael White
